Text: let me be the first to say thanks, since nobody else could be bothered.

Soooo, it downloaded quickly, which was nice.
But every single episode had something off with the audio. Episodes 5,7,10,11, and 13 had the audio, but it paused every second or so. All the others had NO audio.
I hope this is a problem with my computer rather that your torrent, but I thought I should let you know just in case.
